general.name: mwmVisit
general.short: BOSS and/or APOGEE spectra for each visit of a single star.
general.description: BOSS and/or APOGEE spectra for each visit of a single star. These are the data produced before analysis by any of the astra pipelines.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

header.comment: Catalog identifier used to target the source
Error on proper motion in RA [mas/yr]
Error on proper motion in DEC [mas/yr]
Gaia DR3 mean G band magnitude [mag]
Gaia DR3 mean BP band magnitude [mag]
Gaia DR3 mean RP band magnitude [mag]
Number of components fit per band (JHK)
Fraction of W1 flux from this object
Fraction of W2 flux from this object
Error on IRAC band 4.5 micron magnitude [mag]
Source quality flag for IRAC band 4.5 micron

header.value: HDU 1: BOSS spectra from Apache Point Observatory
HDU 2: BOSS spectra from Las Campanas Observatory
HDU 3: APOGEE spectra from Apache Point Observatory
HDU 4: APOGEE spectra from Las Campanas Observatory

header.comment: Number of pixels in the spectrum
